name: LostNFound
description: You control a greedy Penguim called Gasaá Cinca, he is a Pilot and loves to collect treasures through-out his journeys! BUT, in his last expedition, his plane mysteriously malfunctions and he crashes in the middle of an unkown desert. What will he do? Can Gasaá Cinca get out of the desert before he dies of -Dehydration-? Oh no! What an unfortunate event would that be!
